overview: Ricky Price started High-Tech Battery Solutions Inc. website in 2009 while he was a student at Kent State University. It is an offshoot of a 20 year old brick and motor battery specialist operation located in Kent, Ohio. He is dedicated to providing the highest quality batteries available with the longest warranties to meet customers ever growing needs for high-tech battery driven devices. He continues to maintain strong relationships with the highest quality battery manufacturers in the world today.
